page.title: 10THE GARAGE_ CLAWTON
page.content: { Clawton}village has one garage serving it.It is close to the town of Holsworthy.Mr and Mrs{Budge}own it.It was founded in{1934.}They have luckily never had a fire.They sell approximately{7000}litres of petrol per week.They have 2 friendly dogs which I like.Mr.Budge does approximately 100{M.O.T's}per year.He doesn't sell any cars apart from new {Renault's.}Apart from petrol,diesel and cars,He sells sweets,Fizzy drinks, sweets,cigarettes,{oil,tyres}and batteries.He has approximately{250 regular customers for petrol!Budge's garage repair{15}damaged cars per year on average.He has a very small piece of land behind his house,he uses it for rough{grazing.
